alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 11:56PM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches possible above 3000 feet and 1 to 2 feet above 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
